ygData.subject: Traveling to Italy tomorrow night
ygData.msgSnippet: Just to give you guys heads up, I m going to be flying to Italy tomorrow night so you may not see a post until Wednesday afternoon after tomorrow afternoon.

Just to give you guys heads up, I'm going to be flying to Italy tomorrow ni=
ght so you may not see a post until Wednesday afternoon after tomorrow afte=
rnoon.  My flight takes off from Boston at seven and I don't reach my desti=
nation until Wednesday afternoon.   I will let you know when I arrive.
